name: Hell Walker (NudgeForward)
description:
CONTROLS:

Move Left & Right: A & D.

Jump: W.

Slow Time & Dash: Shift & Left Mouse Button.

Attack: Left Mouse Button.

Shotgun: Right Mouse Button.

Consume Civilians to Evolve: Spacebar

This in an unfinished attempt at the Metroidvania Month 19 gamejam. Due to a gamebreaking bug and limited time to work on it we missed deadline. 

Credits:

Primary Artwork: @TheLeafyBomb
Original Music: @TheLeafyBomb
Secondary Artwork: @RubixKuube
Game programming: @RubixKuube
